title: 'Shape changed right in the first week...very bad'
body: 'The shape of both the pillows changed in the first week itself Not recommended to buy... no value for money Instead buy from a local shop....cheaper considering the quality'

title: 'softness and comfort
rating: Happy the way the product packed.'
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''This pillows looks to be more comfortable from the traditional cotton pillows. It is soft and retains shape after use. Good product.'

title: 'Nice and soft as promised'
body: 'This item is really good. It offers soft cushioning'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Extremely soft. Feels like sleeping on a hotel pillow'

title: 'Easy to handle. light weight and quite functional.'
'Value for money'
body: 'Excellent product...very comfortable....would love to buy it again'
